articles.title: iPhone 12 Mini charges slower with MagSafe than other iPhone 12 models - CNET
articles.description: A support document sheds some light on the new Mini's charging capabilities.
articles.content:
MagSafe, Apple's new charging system seen here on an iPhone 12 Pro, won't charge as quickly on the iPhone 12 Mini.
Scott Stein/CNET
The iPhone 12 Mini doesn't officially go on sale until Nov. 13, b… [+1613 chars]

articles.author: Jon Porter
articles.title: Nokia’s name gets slapped on 4K Android TV box with sleek results - The Verge
articles.description: There’s a new Nokia-branded Android TV box on its way to Europe. The Streaming Box 8000 is the work of Streamview, and it reportedly supports 4K playback, costs €100, and will be available later this year.
articles.content:
Complete with full-size remote

articles.author: Jonathan Chadwick
articles.title: Pre-7.1 Android phones won't load secure sites from September 2021 - Daily Mail
articles.description: US-based certificate authority Let's Encrypt said a change in its criteria from next September will mean old Android operating systems won't trust its root certificates.
articles.content:
Millions of secure websites won't load on smartphones that run Android 7.1 or older after September 2021, it has been revealed.  
US-based certificate authority Lets Encrypt said a change in its cri… [+4115 chars]

articles.author: Tom Warren
articles.title: A first look at ray tracing on the $299 Xbox Series S - The Verge
articles.description: Watch Dogs: Legion now supports ray tracing on Xbox Series S and Series X consoles. The effects can be found in puddles, reflective windows, and plenty of neon signs across the London-based world.
articles.content: The little next-gen Xbox is capable of ray tracing
